name: Elementalism
contents:
Uses:
- Elementalist rituals, such as:
  - Speak with animals
  - Commune with nature
  - Warp wood
  - Control weather
  - Tree stride
  - Rebirth
  - Reincarnation
bodyHtml:
Uses:

  • Elementalist rituals, such as:
    • Speak with animals
    • Commune with nature
    • Warp wood
    • Control weather
    • Tree stride
    • Rebirth
    • Reincarnation
